div.h3: Walton County BOC to Hold Emergency Audio Meeting to Adopt Emergency Ordinance because of COVID-19

div.p: The Board of Commissioners will be holding an emergency audio meeting today at noon to adopt the Ordinance Declaring a State of Emergency because of COVID-19. A copy of the proposed ordinance is available on the website at https://go.boarddocs.com/ga/walton/Board.nsf/Public. The public can also view this meeting on Facebook Live at the time mentioned above.
